content:
anyone know where to find official/good examples of slicing in profiles?
this page http://build.fhir.org/profiling-examples.html has examples... but they're clearly wrong. they don't make use of ElementDefinition.id and incorrectly use ElementDefinition.name instead of ElementDefinition.sliceName
can you make a task for us to fix the examples then?
as for examples... IPS works out slicing pretty well
